original: Noāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: noāsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Āsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsavam akusalam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanoāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: noāsavam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na noāsavaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
